metadata.title: CVE-2021-21227 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 90.0.4430.93allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
